meanings.definition: The quality or state of being felonious.
meanings.sent1: His feloniousness was evident from the way he constantly broke the law.
meanings.sent2: The detective was able to prove the suspect's feloniousness in court.
meanings.sent3: Despite his charming demeanor, his feloniousness always caught up with him.
meanings.sent4: The shadow of feloniousness followed him wherever he went.
meanings.sent5: The town was plagued by the feloniousness of a notorious gang.

meanings.definition: The act of committing a felony.
meanings.sent1: The feloniousness of the crime shocked the entire community.
meanings.sent2: After the trial, his feloniousness was clear to everyone.
meanings.sent3: The cat's feloniousness in stealing treats from the pantry was both amusing and frustrating.
meanings.sent4: The feloniousness of the situation weighed heavily on his conscience.
meanings.sent5: The feloniousness of his actions left a stain on his reputation.
